SELECT bpl.pro_name AS proName, bm.material_code AS materialCode, bm.material_name AS materialName, count(*) AS finishQty, su.user_name AS userName, msbpr.process_name AS processName, date_format( msbpr.in_process_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS finishDate FROM mes_sfc_barcode_process_record msbpr LEFT JOIN base_material bm ON msbpr.material_id=bm.material_id LEFT JOIN base_pro_line bpl ON msbpr.pro_line_id = bpl.pro_line_id LEFT JOIN ocean_v2.sys_user su ON msbpr.operator_user_id = su.user_id
and bpl.pro_name like CONCAT('%', #{proName}, '%')
and bm.material_code like CONCAT('%', #{materialCode}, '%')
and bm.material_name like CONCAT('%', #{materialName}, '%')
and msbpr.process_name like CONCAT('%', #{processName}, '%')
and date_format(msbpr.in_process_time, '%Y-%m-%d')=#{finishDate}
and su.user_name = #{userName}
GROUP BY bpl.pro_name, bm.material_code, bm.material_name, su.user_name, msbpr.process_name
